programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Darrell blasts his way through the competition as Jarrod and Brandi attempt to pull themselves out of their slump and back into the locker saddle. PGR (R)

programme.title: MythBusters
programme.desc: 'It's myths revisited as Adam and Jamie return to right their wrongs: drifting on dirt, blowing things up and an ultimate fan favourite: 'what is bulletproof?' PGR (R)'

programme.title: Elementary
programme.desc: 'S5 Ep22. When a reality show contestant is murdered, Holmes and Watson zero in on another competitor as a suspect, a war criminal who may be the most skilled killer they've ever pursued. PGR'

programme.title: Investec Super Rugby
programme.desc: Catch the action at Forsyth Barr Stadium in Dunedin as the Highlanders play host to the Brumbies. Can the Highlanders take out a win on their home turf? G

programme.title: NRL Premiership
programme.desc: The New Zealand Warriors play host to the Brisbane Broncos at Mt Smart Stadium as the action of the NRL Premiership continues. Will the Warriors be victorious against their first ever competitors? G

programme.title: Sport Box

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: 'Paul Martin presents from Highcliffe Castle in Dorset, and experts Christina Trevanion and Adam Partridge discover an art deco diamond watch and a Newlyn copper teapot to take to auction. G'

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: 'Michael Aspel and the specialists visit Birmingham's Symphony Hall, where objects under scrutiny include a collection of signed portraits from Hollywood's leading performers of the 50s and 60s. G (R)'

programme.title: Mad About You
programme.desc: 'Paul is mortified when his star-struck father calls out to talk show host Regis Philbin across a theatre, but his embarrassment climbs when Regis asks the chatty old man to appear on his show. PGR'

programme.title: Escape To The Continent
programme.desc: 'With 260,000 to fund their planned international move, a couple of house hunters from Cornwall travel to Italy and try out a special culinary craft unique to the Liguria region. G (R)'

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: 'It's halfway through Charles Hanson and Mark Stacey's road trip and the competition is heating up. Leg three begins in Leominster, Herefordshire, and winds up in Itchen Stoke near Winchester. G (R)'

programme.title: Rugby Nation
programme.desc: Tune in for Rugby Nation as we bring you highlights of the latest action from the weekend. G

programme.title: Prime News - First At 5.30
programme.desc: 'Join the Prime News team first at 5.30pm, for all the day's top current events, sports news and to see how the weather is in your region.'

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: 'An Extra Slice: Join Jo Brand for a recap of pudding week, as she sits down with comedians Josh Widdicombe, Tom Allen and radio host Edith Bowman to discuss the good, the bad and the disastrous. G'

programme.title: David Attenborough's Natural
programme.desc: 'Curiosities: David Attenborough investigates two shells that have proved to be winners in evolution, the bird's shell and the hard shell of the tortoise. G'

programme.title: Storage Wars: New York
programme.desc: 'In their backyard, Newark, New Jersey, Chris and Tad look for old money antiques. Mike B has his eye out for commercial gear, while Candy and Courtney need lots of items for an upcoming sale. PGR'

programme.title: Prime Planet: Coast Australia
programme.desc: 'Neil Oliver wanders amidst penal ruins, as he discovers the inspiring legacies of two historic figures; the first an audacious convict, and the second a reforming commandant. G'

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: S19 Ep4. A sinister side to the local pet show is revealed when a dead body is discovered covered in live rabbits. Is this a rivalry taken too far or is the killer driven by something darker? AO

programme.title: 60 Minutes
programme.desc: 'Join journalists Steve Kroft, Scott Pelley, Lesley Stahl and Bill Whitaker as they look back at 50 seasons of 60 Minutes, celebrating 50 years on air. PGR (R)'

programme.title: English Premier League
programme.desc: 'Prime looks at the best bits of the week's English Premier League games, with highlights of England's top division football teams battling it out to be the champions. G (R)'
